All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, ptolemy.actor.Actor, ptolemy.actor.Executable, ptolemy.actor.FiringsRecordable, ptolemy.actor.Initializable, ptolemy.actor.TypedActor, ptolemy.kernel.util.Changeable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Debuggable, ptolemy.kernel.util.DebugListener, ptolemy.kernel.util.Derivable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Instantiable, ptolemy.kernel.util.ModelErrorHandler, ptolemy.kernel.util.MoMLExportable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Moveable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Nameable
public class SecretKeyReader
extends PrivateKeyReader
Open a keystore from a FileParameter and output a SecretKey.

This class is a wrapper class for KeyReader that always returns a secret key.

The secret key is a symmetric key can be used by the SymmetricEncryption and SymmetricDecryption actors. See SymmetricEncryption for a description of symmetric vs. asymmetric algorithms.

Since:
Ptolemy II 4.0
Version:
$Id: SecretKeyReader.java 38798 2005-07-08 20:00:01Z cxh $
Author:
Christopher Hylands Brooks
See Also:
PrivateKeyReader, PublicKeyReader, SecretKey, SignatureVerifier, Serialized Form
